original_text: While her husband is alive, the law has authority over her. If she goes to live with another man, the law says that she has done something wrong. People will call her an adulteress. But if her husband dies, she becomes free from that law. If she then marries another man, she will not be doing anything wrong.
korean_text: 그러므로 만일 그 남편 생전에 다른 남자에게 가면 음녀라 그러나 만일 남편이 죽으면 그 법에서 자유롭게 되나니 다른 남자에게 갈지라도 음녀가 되지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: the law has authority over her
If she goes to live with another man
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그녀가 다른 남자와 함께 살러 간다면

sentences.original_text: the law says that she has done something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 법은 그녀가 잘못된 일을 했다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: People will call her an adulteress
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그녀를 간통한 여자라고 부를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: she becomes free from that law
If she then marries another man
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그녀가 그 다음 다른 남자와 결혼한다면

sentences.original_text: she will not be doing anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아무 잘못도 하지 않을 것입니다
